org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.RegionInfo

  • Packages that use RegionInfo 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees
    Contains decision tree algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased
    Contains column based decision tree algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.contsplitcalcs
    Calculators of splits by continuous features.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors
    Contains feature containers needed by column based decision tree trainers.
